/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their daily routines. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the top right corner, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's architectural details.
